name: Easter Egg Tycoon
description:
Easter Egg Tycoon!

This is a fun 3d tycoon game where you decorate Easter eggs and sell them for a profit.

You will need to left click on the game once it has started, for the player to look around properly and to hide your cursor!

Tutorial

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move and mouse to look around.

Use Space Bar to jump.

Use F to interact with everything in the world.

There are three types of eggs: Chocolate, White Chocolate and Gold.

There are 3 egg spawners (the tree stumps). You can unlock and upgrade each spawner by pressing the yellow button. Eggs can be spawned by pressing the red button.

By upgrading an egg spawner, it will spawn eggs quicker and also allow for rarer and more valuable eggs to spawn.

White boxes will spawn randomly around the map. Inside each box is a decoration to put on your eggs to increase the value of them.

Decorations are applied using the crafting table. This is the table with the red button. An egg and a box must be placed on the table in order to craft them together. There is a  maximum of 3 decorations per egg.

You can sell eggs by placing them on the sell table. This is the table with the green button.

You can adjust your look sensitivity by pressing P - press P again to close the menu.

Advanced Information

Costs for spawner upgrades:

Spawner 1

Level 1: 10

Level 2: 50

Level 3: 200

Spawner 2

Level 1: 300

Level 2: 250

Level 3: 400

Spawner 2

Level 1: 700

Level 2: 400

Level 3: 600
